title: Nearly no Christmas (K)
creator_credit: Yvonne MacKay, Dave Gibson and Gibson Film Productions
brief_description: Set in New Zealand, this story revolves around the problems Santa and his helpers have one Christmas. Rumbletum, the boiler which drives the toy machines in Santa’s factory has broken down. However with the aid of a job and the local penguin colony, Santa makes sure of a full Christmas delivery.
